alert.note: Alert for Allen; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:50AM EST until January 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Icy secondary roads and other outdoor surfaces can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold ground temperatures have caused secondary and untreated roads to become icy and very slippery. Pavement temperatures will rise above freezing later today and allow travel conditions to improve.
info.instruction: Outdoor surfaces have become icy and extremely slippery. If you are traveling, be especially careful driving. Sidewalks, driveways and other paved surfaces have also become icy and should be used with caution.
